amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 204 which seeks to limit the ability to conduct a comprehensive Environmental Impact Statement (EIS).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 113-131 to strike section 204 because it eliminates environmental evaluation typically provided by an Environmental Impact Study (EIS) and because conducting a single multisale EIS for decisions with different timelines creates unnecessary conflicts in the EIS process.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 233 (Roll no. 295).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 233 (Roll no. 295).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Hastings (FL).
